data.DescriptionHtml:
The transmuted creature becomes wiser.
The spell grants an enhancement modifier to Wisdom of 1d4+1 points, adding the usual benefits to Wisdom-related skills.
Clerics, druids, paladins, and rangers who receive owl's wisdom do not gain extra spells, but the save DCs for their spells increase.
Arcane Material Component: A few feathers, or a pinch of droppings, from an owl.
data.Name: Owl's Wisdom
data.Rulebook: Tome and Blood: A Guidebook to Wizards and Sorcerers
